dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright violation - site hosted by theplanet.com]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 18, 2005 6:13 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright violation - site hosted by theplanet.com]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------
From: - Mon Apr 18 18:11:59 2005
X-Mozilla-Status: 0001
X-Mozilla-Status2: 00000000
Received: from [172.16.214.181] (helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)        (Exim 4.50)        id
1DNbOn-0000kD-JH        for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Mon, 18 Apr 2005
13:55:09 -0500
Received: from spooling.theplanet.com ([69.56.141.4]
helo=lili.theplanet.com)        by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)        with smtp (Exim)        id
1DNbOj-000LiQ-Bi
for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Mon, 18 Apr 2005 13:55:09 -0500
Received: (qmail 26472 invoked from network); 18 Apr 2005 18:55:00 -0000
Received: from unknown (HELO ?216.185.111.52?) (172.16.214.110)  by
lili.theplanet.com with SMTP; 18 Apr 2005 18:55:00 -0000
Received: from [172.16.214.181] (helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)        by
mail
with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim 4.50)        id
1DNbOb-0000iQ-Mm        for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 18 Apr 2005 13:54:57
-0500
Received: from smtp.telefonica.net ([213.4.129.135]
helo=telesmtp3.mail.isp)        by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
934267068@infonegocio.com)        with esmtp (Exim) id 1DNbOP-000LfA-6r        for
abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 18 Apr 2005 13:54:57 -0500
Received: from penge ([83.32.153.216]) by telesmtp3.mail.isp        (terra.es)
with ESMTP id IF5OIS01.XMY for <abuse@theplanet.com>;        Mon, 18 Apr 2005
20:54:28 +0200
Message-ID: <027f01c54448$00ed1a40$9e00a8c0@penge>
From: Richard Pendry <rich@mousebreaker.co.uk>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Mon, 18 Apr 2005 20:54:08 +0200
Organization: Mousebreaker Online Games
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed; charset="iso-8859-1";
reply-type=original
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Priority: 1
X-MSMail-Priority: High
X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2180
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2180
Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 213.4.129.135 is neither
permitted nor denied by domain of infonegocio.com) client-ip=213.4.129.135;
envelope-from=934267068@infonegocio.com;
helo=telesmtp3.mail.isp;
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -98.2
Cc:
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright violation - site hosted by theplanet.com
X-BeenThere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.5
Precedence: list
Reply-To: Richard Pendry <rich@mousebreaker.co.uk>
List-Id: abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score: -98.2

Dear Sir/Madam

I am a director of Mousebreaker Ltd, owners of the website
www.mousebreaker.com. It has just been brought to my attention that a site
hosted on one of your servers is in flagrant violation of our copyright.

The site we refer to is www.sweetcore.us which a reverse DNS look up shows
is hosted on theplanet.com servers.

A simple comparison of the two sites should make it perfectly obvious that
all our content has been illegally copied.

I would appreciate it if you could respond immediately to this email to let
me know what action has been taken and if you need any further information.

Regards
Richard Pendry

Creative Director
Mousebreaker Ltd
http://www.mousebreaker.com
http://www.playforyourclub.com
http://www.playapal.com
http://www.blastbilliards.com

The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to
which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged
material.

Any use (including retransmission or copying) of this information by persons
or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited. If you are not
the intended recipient of this transmission, please contact the sender and
delete the material from any computer. The sender is not responsible for the
completeness or accuracy of this communication as it has been transmitted
over a public network.




- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
